title: Petrojet SC
text:
Petrojet Sporting Club (), is an Egyptian sports club based in <a href="Suez">Suez</a>, Egypt. The club is related to Petrojet, a construction company specialized in oil, gas and petrochemical industries.
Petrojet is mainly known for its <a href="Association%20football">football</a> team, which currently plays in the <a href="Egyptian%20Second%20Division">Egyptian Second Division</a>, the second-highest league in the <a href="Egyptian%20football%20league%20system">Egyptian football league system</a>.
Petrojet was promoted to the Egyptian Premier League for the first time in their history only six years after their foundation, as they were promoted from the <a href="Egyptian%20Second%20Division">Egyptian Second Division</a> during the <a href="2005%E2%80%9306%20Egyptian%20Second%20Division">2005–06 season</a>.
Stadium.
Petrojet formerly played their home games at <a href="Cairo%20International%20Stadium">Cairo International Stadium</a>. They now play in <a href="Suez%20Stadium">Suez Stadium</a> .
Squad.
Current first team squad.
Egyptian Football Association (EFA) rules are that a team may only have 3 foreign born players in the squad.
Best achievements.
Individual honours.
<a href="Egyptian%20Premier%20League">Top Goal Scorer in the Egyptian Premier league</a>
